title: module
description: A document that contains information detailing and explaining rules and/or content, meant to be used for rendering by powerd6.

description.description: The human-readable description of what the module contains.

source.description: A hyperlink to the where the module is hosted.

types.description: A collection of types that are defined in this module

content.description: A collection of contents defined in this module, the keys of the map are the unique identifiers of the content pieces

id.description: The unique identifier of the content piece.

type.description: The unique identifier of the content type.
